mapper.select: select GO_TREAT_CODE as goTreatCode, GO_BLOOD_TEST_BLOOD_SUGAR as goBloodTestSugar, GO_BLOOD_TEST_PLATELET as goBloodTestPlatelet, GO_BLOOD_TEST_FILE_PATH as goBloodTestFilePath, GO_BLOOD_TEST_FILE_NAME as goBloodTestFileName, GO_BLOOD_TEST_DATE as goBloodTestDate, GO_BLOOD_TEST_GO_REGISTRATION_DATE as goBloodTestGoRegistrationDate from go_blood_test where GO_BLOOD_TEST_DATE between #{goFirstDate} and #{goSecondDate}
